options.option-description: A common use of this pattern would be to display the days of the week with associated opening times.

options.option-heading: List of paired values, with highlighted pair
options.option-description: For a repeating weekly list of days it may be beneficial to highlight the current day to aid quick identification of the corresponding time. This example demonstrates how it should display if viewed on a Thursday.

options.option-heading: List of paired values, with horizontal dividing lines
options.option-description: For a longer list it may be beneficial to introduce dividing lines to add greater visual separation between pairs. The lines will span the width of the wrapping element. This example is set to one-third the width of the main container.

This example shows a variety of the different types of value that can be used, the size of text has been reduced using the font-scale-reset class and the name of each pair has been set to bold to add visual emphasis. This example is set to half the width of the main container and placed on a light grey background.
